task_definition_name: Mifos Mobile: Bug Fix - UI Issue while adding Transfer
description:
Summary:

UI Issue while adding Transfer

Steps to reproduce:

Click on Transfer
Choose Transfer from Transfer Type
Expected behaviour:

End user should not be able to add money to his/her account from other users accounts due to UI Inconsistency

Observed behaviour:

End user can add money to his/her amount from other users accounts due to UI Inconsistency

Device and Android version:

Xiaomi, Marshmallow
